mapper.select: SELECT re.id as id, re.recommend_type as recommendType, re.spu_id as spuId, sp.original_price as spuOriginalPrice, sp.price as spuPrice, sp.vip_price as spuVipPrice, sp.sales as spuSales, sp.img as spuImg, sp.title as spuTitle, sp.category_id as spuCategoryId FROM kxmall_recommend re, kxmall_spu sp WHERE re.spu_id = sp.id and re.recommend_type = #{recommendType} limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(re.id) FROM kxmall_recommend re, kxmall_spu sp WHERE re.spu_id = sp.id and re.recommend_type = #{recommendType}

SELECT re.id as id, re.recommend_type as recommendType, re.spu_id as spuId, sp.original_price as spuOriginalPrice, sp.price as spuPrice, sp.vip_price as spuVipPrice, sp.sales as spuSales, sp.img as spuImg, sp.title as spuTitle, sp.category_id as spuCategoryId FROM kxmall_recommend re, kxmall_spu sp WHERE re.spu_id = sp.id limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(re.id) FROM kxmall_recommend re, kxmall_spu sp WHERE re.spu_id = sp.id

SELECT re.id as id, re.recommend_type as recommendType, re.spu_id as spuId, sp.original_price as spuOriginalPrice, st.price as spuPrice, sp.vip_price as spuVipPrice, st.sales as spuSales, sp.img as spuImg, sp.title as spuTitle, sp.category_id as spuCategoryId, st.sku_id as skuId, sp.unit as spuUnit, 0 as activityId, 0 as couponId FROM kxmall_recommend re, kxmall_spu sp left join kxmall_stock st on st.spu_id = sp.id WHERE re.spu_id = sp.id and sp.id in (select c.spu_id from kxmall_stock c where c.status = 1 and c.storage_id = #{storageId}) and st.storage_id = #{storageId} and re.recommend_type = #{recommendType} and sp.status = 1
and sp.id not in (select tt.spu_id from kxmall_recommend tt where tt.recommend_type = 1) order by st.sales

SELECT count(re.id) FROM kxmall_recommend re, kxmall_spu sp left join kxmall_stock st on st.spu_id = sp.id WHERE re.spu_id = sp.id and sp.id in (select c.spu_id from kxmall_stock c where c.status = 1 and c.storage_id = #{storageId}) and st.storage_id = #{storageId} and re.recommend_type = #{recommendType} and sp.status = 1
and sp.id not in (select tt.spu_id from kxmall_recommend tt where tt.recommend_type = 1) order by st.sales
